name: Cluster Sets @ ~90% 1RM (~12 min)
time_per_session_breakdown: 3 clusters x ~3 min each + ~2 min rest => ~12 min total
overview_and_execution: Load ~90% 1RM. Perform 1 rep, rest 20–30s, repeat for up to 5 singles. After 1 cluster, rest 2–3 min. Increase weight 2.5–5 lbs once 5 reps per cluster feel consistent.
example_application: Squat at 315 lbs (90% 1RM): 1 rep, rest 30s, 1 rep... for 5 total singles. If all reps are solid, try 320 lbs next session.
important_notes: Maintain perfect form for each single; cluster sets are demanding at high intensities.
